content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I'm happy to discuss the rental price with you. What is your budget for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 900 Euros per month.

My goal is to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.

What is the rental price you are proposing?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for letting me know your budget, Max. Based on the size of the apartment and the current market rates in Munich, I would propose a rental price of 850 Euros per month. This is the lowest price we can offer while still providing a comfortable living space and ensuring that we are able to maximize our gains as a landlord. Is this price within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I agree to the price of 850 Euros.

Thank you for your offer.

I would like to sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.

Please send me the lease agreement and any other necessary documents.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Great to hear that you agree to the price, Max. I'm glad that we were able to come to an agreement that works for both of us. I will send you the lease agreement and any other necessary documents as soon as possible. Once you have reviewed and signed the lease agreement, you can move in to the apartment. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine
